abstract: Telemundo announced on Thursday that it will mount a debate among the Republicans in the presidential race, geared toward the Hispanic audience.
snippet: Telemundo announced on Thursday that it will mount a debate among the Republicans in the presidential race, geared toward the Hispanic audience.
lead_paragraph: Capitalizing on a dispute between Republican candidates and the leading Spanish-language network, Univision, that network's main competitor, Telemundo, has announced that it will host a debate among the Republicans in the presidential race.

headline.main: Telemundo Plans Its First Presidential Debate
